content:
1.流媒体检测脚本 GitHub
wget -O nf https://github.com/sjlleo/netflix-verify/releases/download/v3.1.0/nf_linux_amd64 && chmod +x nf && ./nf 2.x-ui脚本 GitHub
bash <(curl -Ls https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vaxilu/x-ui/master/install.sh)' 3.XrayR脚本 GitHub
wget -N https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XrayR-project/XrayR-release/master/install.sh && bash install.sh 4.哪吒探针 GitHub
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/naiba/nezha/master/script/install.sh -o nezha.sh && chmod +x nezha.sh && sudo ./nezha.sh
title: VPS常用脚本
